page.title: 12ORCHID GROWING P WAKLEY
page.content: Gittisham was the birthplace of John Dominy, who made the first orchid hybrid at Veitches of Exeter. Combe House once had a commercial cut flower orchid collection. Mrs Marker is now the Patron of the Devon Orchid society. I, for my sins, am on the committee and joint librarian. Orchids are becoming more and more popular. With modern forms of propagation prices are either being held steady or are coming down. My greenhouse is an eight foot six by ten foot half boarded cedar house. Heat is supplied by a parafin boiler feeding four inch cast iron pipes. Temperatures are kept at a Winter minimum of 50 F with a growing care at 60 F. My main interest is species; some are collected from the wild but are mostly grown from seed or propagated in nurseries.
